definition: name of a place, Gezhouba Dam on the Changjiang River, in Sichuan
kudzu (Pueraria lobata)/hemp cloth
surname Ge
continent/island in a river
dam/dike/embankment/CL:條|条[tiao2]

sentences.english: After the construction of Gezhouba Dam, sturgeon resources in Yangtze River have declined notably.
sentences.chinese: 葛洲壩樞紐建成後，長江鱘魚類資源顯著衰退。

sentences.english: Both Gezhouba Project and Three-gorges dam are built in Yichang.
sentences.chinese: 葛洲壩工程和三峽大壩都處在宜昌。

sentences.english: It has descended obviously since the construction of Gezhouba.
sentences.chinese: 自葛洲壩修建以來，宜昌斷面枯水位明顯下降。

sentences.english: The Three-Gorges and Gezhouba cascade in china is taken as a study case.
sentences.chinese: 本文以國內的三峽葛洲壩梯級水電站作爲研究對象。

sentences.english: It analyzes the situation of leakage of No. 3 Shiplock and design and construction of leak stoppage.
sentences.chinese: 分析葛洲壩3號船閘漏水情況及補漏設計與施工。

sentences.english: Gezhouba Dam was originally an ancient city in ruins.
sentences.chinese: 葛洲壩原是一座古城的遺址。
